name: Ace of Aces
overview: Messerschmidts darken the skies in front of you: JU-88 bombers move steadily toward their targets. At last, you've reached your objective — a fleet of U-boats with bad intentions. You dive in to make a bombing run, but you overshoot! Turn around to try again, and the enemy fighters are all over you! Fire, dodge, climb, and fire again! Your left engine is in flames, your fuel supply dwindling ..can you weather the storm?
